VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Fleming-Rosario Academy?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Fleming-Rosario Academy is arc {Adriantown College}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Herman Research Center?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Herman Research Center is arc {Parker University}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Adriantown College} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Parker University} has the largest input flow.

EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Odonnell Laboratory and Fleming-Rosario Academy is {10}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Parker University and Odonnell Laboratory in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Herman Research Center?
SC.A: The total flow output from Herman Research Center is {40}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 37? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {91} from {Adriantown College} to {Parker University}, a flow of {44} from {Parker University} to {Adriantown College}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 7? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: No pairs have a flow less than the threshold.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 10 and 17? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {15} from {Parker University} to {Odonnell Laboratory}, a flow of {13} from {Fleming-Rosario Academy} to {Parker University}, a flow of {11} from {Parker University} to {Fleming-Rosario Academy}, a flow of {10} from {Fleming-Rosario Academy} to {Odonnell Laboratory}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Parker University to Fleming-Rosario Academy or from Parker University to Herman Research Center?
NC.A: The flow from {Parker University} to {Herman Research Center} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Parker University to Herman Research Center, from Odonnell Laboratory to Parker University, or from Parker University to Adriantown College?
NC.A: The flow from {Parker University} to {Adriantown College} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Adriantown College}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Adriantown College} and {Parker University}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Fleming-Rosario Academy, Arc Parker University, Arc Adriantown College, Arc Herman Research Center, Arc Odonnell Laboratory}.
